attributes.action: Ask the BBC to put all 43 BBC local radio stations on the Sky platform
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I would like the Government to ask the BBC to put all the BBC local radio channels on the Sky platform.
At the present time all the local BBC Television channels can be viewed on the Sky platform.
Although all BBC local radio channels
are streamed on the internet.
In my opinion, listeners would prefer to listen to the BBC local radio channels coming out of their television as opposed to being "tied" to their computer
BBC london is the only local radio station that can be heard on the Sky platform.
The benefit to the BBC is that where ever you lived in the U.K. you could hear "YOUR" BBC local radio channel, without having to resort to purchasing a computer
